name: Light Events
tagline: Testando a API Ambient Light Events
body:
### Experimento Ligth Events Test this API and experiment the night [Demo](thulioph.com/labs/light-events/) ## Installation Clone this repository and view the code. only :) ``` $ git clone https://github.com/thulioph/light-events.git ``` ## Usage Is necessary,
- One mac with [firefox Nightly](http://nightly.mozilla.org/) - Light (turn on and turn off) ## Contributing 1. Fork it! 2. Create your feature branch: `git checkout -b my-new-feature` 3. Commit your changes: `git commit -am 'Add some feature'` 4. Push to the branch: `git push origin my-new-feature` 5. Submit a pull request :D ## Credits This post the [Loop Infinito](http://loopinfinito.com.br/2013/07/30/ambient-light-events/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
